item.title: Home made Energy Bars
item.description: Ingredients Sunflower Oil – 120ml/3/4 cup Soft Dark Brown Sugar – 200g/1 cup Golden Syrup – 2 tbsp Peanut Butter – 1 tbsp Vanilla Extract – 1/2 tsp Sesame Seeds – 25g / 2 tbsp Sunflower Seeds – 25g / 2 tbsp Flaked Almonds – 50g / 1/2 cup Sultanas – 50g / 1/2 cup Chopped Dates – 50g / 1/2 cup Thick cut porridge oats/oatmeal – 225g / 8 oz Method Sunflower Oil – 120ml/3/4 cup Soft Dark Brown Sugar – 200g/1 cup Golden Syrup – 2 tbsp Peanut Butter – 1 tbsp Vanilla Extract – 1/2 tsp Melt these ingredients in a pan over a low heat until melted and mixed together.
